meta.title: Loop Break — Just Enjoying Being Erased Now (Pencilling Myself Back In)
related_calls: 22-06-25 - 05-00 justs enjoying being errased now, pencilling myself back in_en-GB.txt

quotes.quote: Hi, I'm just reporting that I've just been hung up on twice by Sussex Police.
quotes.source: 22-06-25 - 05-00 justs enjoying being errased now, pencilling myself back in_en-GB.txt

quotes.quote: I was denied a phone interview at 8:15 on Monday morning.
quotes.source: 22-06-25 - 05-00 justs enjoying being errased now, pencilling myself back in_en-GB.txt

quotes.quote: This phone call is being recorded. It will be sent to the IOPC if you deny me another officer…
quotes.source: 22-06-25 - 05-00 justs enjoying being errased now, pencilling myself back in_en-GB.txt

quotes.quote: Denied me all safeguarding since my suicide on April 6th. Told my abuser no further action on April 27th…
quotes.source: 22-06-25 - 05-00 justs enjoying being errased now, pencilling myself back in_en-GB.txt

quotes.quote: Today my abusers have like, rung me… accusing me of raping her.
quotes.source: 22-06-25 - 05-00 justs enjoying being errased now, pencilling myself back in_en-GB.txt

quotes.quote: Oh, fuck off. Get me my human rights.
quotes.source: 22-06-25 - 05-00 justs enjoying being errased now, pencilling myself back in_en-GB.txt
22-06-25 - 05-00 justs enjoying being errased now, pencilling myself back in_en-GB.txt

evidence_links.file: 22-06-25 - 05-00 justs enjoying being errased now, pencilling myself back in_en-GB.txt
evidence_links.summary: Final 101 call in the June 22 sequence. Ben reports repeated hangups, denial of Victims’ Code rights, and being erased post-suicide. The call ends in resigned laughter — a loop-breaking moment.
